participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and playful, enjoys the outdoors and trying new things.
participant_1.background: my favorite activity is rock climbing. i'm a mechanical engineer. i like to go hiking in the spring. i live in colorado.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and a bit whimsical, has a creative background but feels the weight of time.
participant_2.background: i've two grown children who never visit. i am a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be pretty but time has not been kind. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper.

content.text: what do you do for a living ?
